channel.title: Writers Guild of America on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Writers Guild of America on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Writers Guild Calls for Investigation After ‘Late Show’ Cancellation, Citing Bribery Concerns
item.description: The East and West coast branches of the union, which represent scribes on the show, conveyed concerns that the move may be “sacrificing free speech to curry favor with the Trump Administration.”
